newFile.message: Click the {icon} button to create a new program.

backupFiles.action: Click {icon} to back up your programs.

flashPybricksFirmware.message: To use {appName}, you have to install the Pybricks firmware.

restoreOfficialFirmware.message: You can restore the official {lego} firmware at any time.

connectToHub.message: Click the Bluetooth button to connect.

downloadAndRun.message: Once connected, click the {icon} button to run your program.
downloadAndRun.runAgain: The program is now saved on the hub. Press the button on the hub to run it again.
